name: Miami Chase
storyline: Armed with a Magnum and a Ferrari F40, you're no longer a regular cop. Take part in breathtaking street racing with extra turbos, injection systems, wheelblades, oil cannons, spray glass, power steering, body kits and more. Bring the Hoodlums and creeps on the streets to Justice.
summary: As the tough cop Don Ferrari, you have been tasked by the Mayor of Miami to rid the city of its 5 most notorious crime lords (4 in the Commodore 64 version) within 48 hours, in the hope of boosting his re-election chances. Driving a souped-up F40, your objective is to scour the streets of Miami, locate and destroy the red cars driven by the criminals. Once all the red cars are eliminated, the exit to the current level will open, allowing you to confront the yellow car-driving crime lord. However, you must be cautious, as reckless driving near other police cars will result in being stopped, costing you valuable time. Using the city map, you must navigate the streets, destroy the criminal elements, and complete your mission within the tight 48-hour deadline.
